themeCSS: .edgeLabel .label span { color: #333333; } .edgeLabel .label { background-color: transparent; } .labelBkg { background-color: transparent !important; } .cluster-label .nodeLabel { font-weight: 700; font-size: 18px; } [class^='section-'] span, [class*=' section-'] span { color: #ffffff !important; } .label.attribute-type span, .label.attribute-name span, .label.attribute-comment span, .label.attribute-keys span { color: #333333 !important; } g.label.name span { font-weight: 700; font-size: 18px; } .sectionTitle { font-weight: 700; font-size: 18px; } text.actor > tspan { font-weight: 700; font-size: 18px; }
